video.title: Flesh for the Beast: Tsukiko's Curse
video.synopsis: Three psychic paranormal investigators tackle an onslaught of supernatural horrors and occult mysteries, from zombies and cults to sexy vampires.

episodes.synopsis: A paranormal team arranges a creepy posthumous marriage ceremony and honeymoon for a mourning bride and her dead fiancé.
episodes.title: The Conjugal Corpse

episodes.synopsis: A local sheriff posts a reward for the capture of two vampire girls who are sucking the local boys dry.
episodes.title: Blood Bath

episodes.synopsis: Tsukiko pretends to be demonically possessed to help debunk an exorcist and his daughters.
episodes.title: Devil's Bride

episodes.synopsis: Tsukiko and Fortune must travel the astral plane to rescue Parsons from the clutches of a ravenous demon.
episodes.title: Jersey Devil Girl: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: With Parsons' life in jeopardy, Fortune and Tsukiko encounter a deranged coven leader and a powerful demon as they travel the astral plane.
episodes.title: Jersey Devil Girl: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Tsukiko investigates a graveyard disturbance that leads her to an infamous and powerful occult book.
episodes.title: Resurrection Zone

episodes.synopsis: Tsukiko prepares an epic occult ritual to gain entrance into another dimension and battle her inner demon.
episodes.title: Father Knows Beast
